headline: Hola! We are team Altius
description1: With the humble building blocks of innovation, creativity, determination and technique,we intend to craft entities that are record breaking in size and awe inspiring in grandeur. Whether it is a computer geek with a head full of algorithms or a novice looking for intellectual stimulation,Altius has something for everyone.
description2: Altius offers the sponsors unique opportunities for publicity and branding in a vibrant and intellectually stimulating atmosphere.If anything defines the face of Altius, then The spirit of Engineering is the endeavor that showcases it.
description3: Altius is an Intra College Fest of NIT kurukshetra with 60+ events divided into 9 categories.
